casebody.data:
No. 09-10261. Edward Basley, Petitioner v. United States. 562 U.S. 1079, 131 S. Ct. 635, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 9142.

178 L. Ed. 2d 510,

November 29, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of *511Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 357 Fed. Appx. 455.
